VNT reached an all time high at 35.63

For the full year 2021, Vontier anticipates adjusted diluted net earnings per share to be in the range of $2.55 to $2.65. <- this would put their current price as P/E around 12... they grew revenue 16% last Q. With a 16 PE they are a $40 stock. Why such a discount?

Vontier Set to Join S&P 500 Vontier Corp. (NYSE:VNT) will be added to the S&P 500 effective prior to the opening of trading on Friday, October 9, replacing Noble Energy Inc. (NASD:NBL), which will be removed from the S&P 500 effective prior to the open of trading on Monday, October 12. S&P 500 & 100 constituent Chevron Corp. (NYSE:CVX) acquired Noble Energy in a deal that was completed today. Vontier will be added to the S&P 500 following its spin-off from S&P 500 constituent Fortive Corp. (NYSE:FTV). Post spin-off, Fortive will remain in the S&P 500. https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/vontier-set-to-join-sp-500-301146042.html
